item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.

Last month, we had a great meeting again. we went to the hopkinton state park to enjoy the sun.

This month's meeting we can share more about our spiritual life and How we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.
item.name: Westborough spirituality Augurst meetup
